name: Pumpkin Quest
description:
Grow and collect enough pumpkins to fill the carriage. Use spade to protect pumpkins from hungry worms. Plant seeds to grow more (make sure ground is spaded first).

Instructions:
- WASD - movement
- left mouse - attack/spade
- right mouse - plant (must be over spaded ground)
- Goal: get grown pumpkins over to carriage
